page.title: 13DERBY DAY IMPRESSIONS
page.content:
{... "Walking past fish-and-chip stalls {smells nice when you're hungry. The {smell of candy floss and toffee apple, {beefburgers and hot-dogs mixed with {ice-cream,shell fish,doughnuts,jacket {potatoes and fried onions filled the {air."
... "There were lots of things for sale - balloons,toys,bags,watches and flowers."
{..."I saw this man playing a guitar. {He was a busker because he had flares {on and a ripped tee-shirt and he was {dirty." { ... "Helicopters buzzing, Cameras clicking, Engines wurring, Chattering,laughing, { } What a busy day."
